alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Clay; Jackson; Lee; Leslie; Owsley; Perry; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 10:13PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Owsley, northwestern Leslie, northwestern Perry, east central Jackson, Breathitt, southeastern Lee, south central Wolfe and northeastern Clay Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1012 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Vancleve to Canoe to Sacker Gap. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain rates, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Vancleve, Wilhurst, Canoe, Talbert, Sebastian`s Branch, Frozen Creek, Crockettsville, Lawson, Gentry and Houston around 1015 PM EDT. Buckhorn, Sewell, Fivemile, Howard Creek and Elkatawa around 1020 PM EDT. Keck, Whick, Saldee, Copland, Beech, Haddix and Taff around 1025 PM EDT. Jackson, Wolf Coal, Altro, Little, Bush Branch, Taulbee, Gays Creek and Lost Creek around 1030 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Noctor, Barwick, Watts, Inverness, Dumont, Clayhole, Flintville, Chavies, Quicksand, Newfound, Spurlock, Haginsville, Lamont, Portsmouth, Smith Branch, Bays, Hardshell, Krypton, Mistletoe, Stevenson, Ned, Rousseau, Press and Wilstacy. THIS INCLUDES Hal Rogers Parkway between mile markers 29 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Clay; Jackson; Lee; Leslie; Owsley; Perry; Wolfe
